extendedInfo.description: This app is intended to enhance the user's experience at the Red Red Wine Bar located in Annapolis, Maryland.With this app you can:-View the most recent menu at the Red Red Wine Bar.-Select current beverages that are available.-Add beverages to your virtual "Wine Cellar"-Comment on your beverages in your virtual "Wine Cellar"-Take pictures of the beverage, atmosphere, or what ever you desire to be associated with a beverage-Post a beverage name and it's comments to Facebook*Shout out to my brother Doug who made the icon.*Side Note* letter accents have been dropped due to device compatibilityAlso, Please let me know of any errors that you encounter and I will fix them asapRed Red Wine Bar:Located at 189B Main Street, Annapolis, MD. Red Red Wine Bar is a mood, a feeling, a vibe. 18th century Victorian. New Orleans-y. Eclectic. Bohemian. Funky. The space is a living slideshow constantly changing before your eyes. Most importantly, though, itâs a hideaway specifically designed to engage every one of your senses.

reviews.title: Among my fav Naptown bars.
reviews.comment: Like the app alot at first glance. They have been building a good rep for live music,would like to see an event calendar in next release if possoble. I have the auto-update box clicked.   :)
reviews.author: A Google User
